verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Miady ho anao izao,
Irery tao Getsemane,
'Lay Tompo tena tia anao,
mpanota, mijere !

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ario (ny ota izao)
Ny ota izao, (ario ny ota izao),
Ario (ario)
Andeha jereo ny Tomponao
Dia mibebaha re anio.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mitondra latsa ho anao,
Irery am-pitsaharana e
'Lay Tompon-danitra izao,
Mpanota, mijere.
Ario, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He maty ho anao izao,
Irery ao an'alim-be,
Ny Tompo, moa fantatrao ?
Mpanota, mijere.
Ario, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Iriny aminao ny fo
Mba hanjakany hatrizao,
Hamboariny ho lapa soa,
Moa foinao ve, lazao ?
Ario, sns.
